OUROPINIONS, ASLAWYERS, WEREAGAINST THEADMISSION OFTHIS EVIDENCE,BUT OUR CLIENTINSISTS THATTHE EVIDENCESHALL BEADMITTED,CONTRARY TOOUR BESTJUDGMENT, WEHAVECONSENTED.
